question:
Aurangzeb sent which of the following to destroy the Maratha power when Shivaji sacked the rich port of Surat?
1) Raja Jai Singh of Amber
2) Diler Khan
3) General Rustam-i-Zaman
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Shivaji sacked the rich port of Surat in 1664 CE. This plundering of Surat enraged Aurangzeb and he sent Raja Jai Singh of Amber and Diler Khan to destroy the Maratha power. Rustam-i-Zaman was the title of a Bijapuri general who commanded Adil Shah's 10,000 strong army, in the Battle of Kolhapur against Shivaji's forces.
